news.title: Violent criminals could be let out early for good behaviour under new proposals
news.summary: The landmark sentencing review calls for fewer custodial sentences and earlier prison releases.

news.title: Gazans fear shutdown of water plants as Israel widens offensive
news.summary: Parents say children are having to drink unsafe and salty water, as fuel shortages threaten desalination and hygiene facilities.

news.title: UK to sign Chagos deal with Mauritius
news.summary: The US and UK will maintain a key military base on the island for 99 years, under the multi-billion pound deal.

news.title: Chris Mason: Labour is still blaming the Conservatives
news.summary: A year on from the election, the government needs to demonstrate delivery to claw back some popularity.

news.title: UK sea temperatures soar after exceptionally warm Spring
news.summary: Sea temperatures in some areas off the UK and Ireland are 4C above average.

news.title: Why Starmer will struggle to win on immigration
news.summary: New figures are expected to show a fall in net migration. But still, Labour will struggle to soothe public concern, writes our senior correspondent Allan Little.

news.title: Ramaphosa keeps cool during Trump's choreographed onslaught
news.summary: The BBC's Gary O'Donoghue analyses how the South African president reacted in an extraordinary Oval Office meeting.

news.title: M&S website completely down, leaving users unable to browse
news.summary: The site reads: "Sorry you can't browse the site currently. We're making some updates and will be back soon."

news.title: North Korea's Kim slams 'serious accident' at warship launch
news.summary: The failed launch "severely damaged the dignity and pride of our nation in an instant," says the North Korean leader.

news.title: Watch: Deep inside a Norwegian mountain, Nato allies train for Arctic war
news.summary: Europe editor Katya Adler gains access to a secret HQ and Norwegian warships leading military exercises.
